briefdescription.para: Create configuration file with default values.

detaileddescription.para: Create configuration file with default values.

If not possible load configuration file, create a new with default values.
esp_err_t - If ERR_OK success.

If not possible load configuration file, create a new with default values.
esp_err_t - If ERR_OK success, otherwise fail.

Erase NVS.
esp_err_t - If ERR_OK success.
